636670.name: The Grand Ball Soundtrack & Director's Commentary
636670.description:
Lose yourself in the magic of “The Grand Ball” with this collection of enchanting, graceful and magnificent orchestral tracks that provided the soundtrack of this charming visual novel. Close our eyes and imagine yourself dancing the night away in an elegant estate in the British countryside!

“The Grand Ball” features a collection of orchestrated chamber and parlour music and also many songs specifically composed for this visual novel. Also included is the director’s commentary for those of you interested in the thought process behind the creation of “The Grand Ball”.

Tracks Included:

01 – Atlantis Sunk
02 – Jameson’s Theme
03 – Amelia’s Theme
04 – A Pleasant Conversation
05 – Christine’s Theme
06 – Margrave’s Theme
07 – Melita
08 – Alice where art thou?
09 – Interlude Piano
10 – Trouble Brewing
11 – Moon and Stars (End Credit theme)
12 – Director’s Commentary
